title: Yesterday
actors: Leleti Khumalo, Lihle Mvelase, Kenneth Khambula, Harriet Lenabe
plot: A woman's journey. In a Zulu village, Yesterday is a cheerful mother with an inquisitive five-year-old child, Beauty. Yesterday has a persistent cough, and after several attempts to see the doctor at a regional clinic, she gets a diagnosis. She goes immediately to Jo'burg, where her husband is a miner. Then she must deal with consequences. Her singular motivation is to see that Beauty enrolls in school the next fall. The film begins and ends with Yesterday walking on a road.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.
